EmailTemplate.name: TriCON 2012.Time is running out
EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON - Time is running out
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Tick, Tock...Only a few days left to save TriTech's Annual User Conference l September 26 - 28, 2012 Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Client}},
Saving $100 is just a click away - Registration fees and hotel rates increase on August 26!
TriCON is the place to get in-depth product training, a sneak peek at product advancements, and important face time with TriTech staff. Click here <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/TriCON2012_Agenda_Public_08132012.pdf> for a link to the latest detailed agenda and get the full scoop of what TriCON has to offer.
Register by August 26 for the best registration and hotel rates*!
*TriCON's room reservation cut off date at the Hilton Bayfront is August 26, 2012. Reservations received after this date will be honored at a seasonal rate on space availability.
<http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/TriTech_JustificationLetter.doc> Register Today
Early-bird Registration before August 26: $695 - Conference Registration. $645 - First Time Attendee Registration
<http://www.cvent.com/d/vcqlkf/4W>
Hotel: $199 per night - Hotel Group Rate cutoff August 26.
<http://www.hilton.com/en/hi/groups/personalized/S/SANCCHH-TTSS-20120924/index.jhtml?WT.mc_id=POG>
